{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3736819,"name":"","username":"katherine971","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/k/b4bc9f/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-09-11T20:50:57.773Z","cooked":"

Hi everyone!

Team 971, Spartan Robotics, is excited to announce that we will be hosting our seventh annual Spartan Series in October! Spartan Series is an event featuring presentations by our students and mentors about everything FRC, both technical and non-technical. It will be hosted in-person on October 11th, 2025 at our lab at Mountain View High School (3535 Truman Ave). Presentations will also be recorded and posted on YouTube.

Anyone interested, regardless of skill level or experience, is invited to learn more about mechanical, software, electrical, competition, and other topics from our members. Spartan Series is an amazing opportunity to gain new knowledge, meet other members of the FRC community, and network!

This year’s topics are: Creating a Picklist, 2025 Robot Overview, Vision on the Orin, Starting a JV Team, Rewriting a Codebase, Scouting System, and PCB Design.

If you are interested in attending or if you want to be sent the link to the recordings, please fill out this form: bit.ly/spartanseries25. For more information, please see our website: spartanrobotics.org/spartan-series

We hope to see you there!

Unfortunately, due to issues with scheduling and logistics, we will be canceling the in-person event for Spartan Series this year. Presentations will still be recorded, and we look forward to sharing them with the rest of the FRC community on Youtube at youtube.com/@smanrobotics!
